Action.author: awjh-ibm
Action.body: The current solution for allowing users to specify their array type relies on this being a string. If typescript is updated to provide array types in the metadata we will come back and changed this. For now it is best left as a string

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: ~awjh-ibm is this not resolved in the master branch now?

Action.author: awjh-ibm
Action.body: No, this will not be resolved as we need it in string format. If they pass in the type and it is an array we will be back to knowing just that it is an array and not the type of the items. This can only be resolved when typescript lets us reflect the item types of arrays.

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: Limitation of the current platform; therefore will close; we need to remain with the current approach until such a time as Typescript has greater introspection support.
